entry.title: Anichini Fairfield Turkish Cotton Washcloths Towels - 12 Pieces
entry.summary:
Vendor: Anichini
Type: Washcloths
Price: 19.99

Introducing our new Fairfield terry cotton washcloths towels which are part of our hotel bath linen collection. Made from a 100% cotton Turkish terry which is exceedingly thick and absorbent. Sculpted in a variation of the classic "Check" hotel towel. These Turkish cotton washcloths are very durable in nature and tear-resistant which will give them a long life. It gives a soft, plush, and feathery feel to your skin. For best results, wash separately before first use. These washcloth towels get fluffier with each wash. Turkey has been renowned for weaving the finest terry towels for centuries and these are among the best of the best. Why does Turkey weave the finest terry? It truly is the best!
  • STYLE: Fairfield 
  • TYPE: Washcloths
  • SIZE(S): 12" x 12"
  • QUANTITY INCLUDED: 12
  • FABRIC THICKNESS: 600 GSM
  • MADE IN: Turkey
  • WHOLESALE AVAILABLE!
